Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] [1.02] Generate Word, Excel, and PowerPoint documents from agents built from Copilot Studio lite
Description:
With the lite version of Copilot Studio in M365, users can now use Office skills like generating PowerPoint decks, Excel spreadsheets, and Word documents by chatting with the agent. This helps users save time by completing commonly used tasks. These Office skills will come as a part of the "Generate documents, charts, and code" capability in Copilot Studio lite (formerly known as Code Interpreter).
GA date: November CY2025
